Welcome to the special LowEndTalk Offer!

**Some facts:**
Our nodes:
CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3770 CPU @ 3.40GHz,
RAM: 32 GB
RAID10 with enterprise drives (SSDs coming soon, maybe as well as SSD CACHING)
OpenVZ virtualized
Location: Germany, Frankfurt

TestFiles/LookingGlass: http://84.200.70.70/


Our other plans: http://www.rootnerds.com/vps.php

**LET Special:**
2 €/Month (recurring) - [Order](https://billing.rootnerds.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1) - Promo: 5COD3BW3BF
2 Cores
256 MB RAM
128 MB vSWAP
10 GB HDD Hardware RAID 10
Fair use traffic. If you need more than 1 TB every month, we might need to talk to you.
1 IPv4 included
10 IPv6 - more on request
